channel.title: Home made vertical slab roller
channel.description:
[Lawrence Weathers] This is a home made vertical slab roller that I have about $12 invested in, for the canvas. The rest was schrounged from a junk yard It works very well and takes up almost no space no and requires no welding. If it is not clear from the photos Message me if it is not clear from the photos how it works I will be glad to help
![image|480x640](upload://39GoTkUGxHzrV6RrsZTCfvyAg25.jpeg)
![image|480x640](upload://emwY5nI3h50ef6KL5gQ33PVI71q.jpeg)
![image|480x640](upload://ziYvztqcWMdDXG46lU97N5ppLxT.jpeg)
![image|480x640](upload://7JUDpPwM1I7JUxmGnBuzqFpPbri.jpeg)
![image|480x640](upload://ubDdnm9zTuA3OJlLW9WXlWdbL8g.jpeg)
